attributes.description: The new third generation Nissan X-Trail is an absolute show-stopper. Redesigned to be bolder, sleeker and more stylish than ever before, this good looking vehicle is still just as rugged and ready to hit the open road in search of the next adventure as the Nissan X-Trails that came before it. Don’t be deceived by its stylish appearance, the Nissan X-Trail yearns to explore the unknown yet is at home in the urban jungle as well. Dynamic, versatile, spacious and luxurious, it is the perfect partner for fast paced city life or out of town exploring.
